comment._content: This is a Mikoyan-Gurevich MiG-23BN Flogger-H (see note on photo).

comment.author: 9243200@N04
comment._content: Wow! Very interesting. I'd presume the Cuban pilot had defected and he nor the plane weren't ever going back to Cuba. I'd be curious where this jet ended up.

comment.author: 25695066@N00
9243200@N04
comment._content: Wow!!! Incredible story!! That took some serious courage on his part, and that is awesome that he got his family safely out of there! Thanks for the information on that, TVL1970.
